name: Portal Game for Monthly Scratch Game Jam #6
name_original: Portal Game for Monthly Scratch Game Jam #6
description:
This is my submission for the Monthly Scratch Jam #6

Press the D button to move and use the Mouse to and click to put a portal.

You can only enter the Blue Portal and it will teleport to the Orange Portal.

I know the game is verry buggy, I was to lazy to fix any of it.\

I did everything in this game even the music.
